title: You said you grow old with me
lyrics: Tone Intro:  I'd like to sa y i'm o kay but i'm not i try but i f all Close my mind turn it o ff but i can' t be s ober, i ca nnot s leep y ou've got your peace now, but w hat about me? Thought we had the time, had our lives, Now you'll never get older, older Didn't say goodbye, now I'm f rozen in time, Getting colder, colder One last word, One last moment, to ask you w hy you left me here behind    We had plans We had visions Now I can't see ahead We were one We were golden For ever you said
